title: Strade Bianche Edges Closer to ‘Monument’ Status with 2 New Gravel Sectors, Longer Distances
content:
The Italian classic over the white roads of Tuscany sees significant changes for 2024, with a new finishing loop, and the men's race topping 200km for the first time.

Read the full article at Strade Bianche Edges Closer to ‘Monument’ Status with 2 New Gravel Sectors, Longer Distances on Velo.
author: ahood
